title: Get TTO creator ranking or search labels

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by a TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: tto_tcm_account_id
parameters.description: The ID of the TikTok One Creator Marketplace account. To obtain the IDs of the accounts that you can access via Access-Token , use /tto/oauth2/tcm/ .

parameters.name: label_type
parameters.description: The type of label. Enum value: RANKING : ranking label. A label that can be used with /tto/tcm/rank/ for ranking creators. SEARCH : search label. A label that can be used with /tto/tcm/creator/discover/ for discovering creators.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: industry_labels
fields.description: The list of creator industry labels, which can be used to obtain Branded Content creator rankings on TTO Creator Leaderboard. Creator industry labels are assigned to creators based on the commercial content they produce, including ad creatives and branded content on their TikTok accounts, and represent their commercial experience in certain industries.

fields.name: label_id
fields.description: The ID of the creator industry label.

fields.name: label_name
fields.description: The name of the creator industry label.

fields.name: content_labels
fields.description: The list of content tag labels, which can be used to obtain Organic Content creator rankings on TTO Creator Leaderboard. Content tag labels are assigned to creators based on the main focus of the creator’s TikTok account, and represent the direction of the creator’s organic content.

fields.name: label_id
fields.description: The ID of the content tag label.

fields.name: label_name
fields.description: The name of the content tag label.
